item.lycanitesmobs.rabbitooze_bucket.des: Just as cold and dangerous as regular Ooze but no mobs spawn in this and can be renewed like water.
item.lycanitesmobs.moglava_bucket.descri: Clearer that regular lava, flows slightly faster and no mobs spawn in this. Can be renewed like water.
item.lycanitesmobs.acid_bucket.descripti: A deadly substance, causes penetration and applies damage over time.
item.lycanitesmobs.sharacid_bucket.descr: Refined acid, just as deadly but no mobs spawn in this and can be renewed like water.
item.lycanitesmobs.vesspoison_bucket.des: Just as foul as regular poison but no mobs spawn in this and can be renewed like water.
item.lycanitesmobs.veshoney_bucket.descr: A sweet and sticky fluid formed and found in Vespid hives.
item.lycanitesmobs.wintergift.descriptio: Good tidings, Happy Yuletide and Merry Christmas! Open it up and do see what's inside!
item.lycanitesmobs.wintergift.good: You open your present and it's a pleasant surprise!
item.lycanitesmobs.wintergift.bad: Oh no! It's a gift of pain, misery and nightmares!
item.lycanitesmobs.wintergiftlarge.descr: It's December 25th! Time to open your big presents! Ignore the screeching sound the box makes, it's nothing...
item.lycanitesmobs.wintergiftlarge.bad: Aaaahhhhh Haaa Haaa Haaa Ha Ha Ha! Bwahahahah! Happy Holidays!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulkey.description: Use to activate a summoning altar to call for a rare monster or activate a special event.
item.lycanitesmobs.soulkeydiamond.descri: A more powerful Soul Key capable for summoning more powerful bosses!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulkeyemerald.descri: A more powerful Soul Key capable for summoning more powerful bosses!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone.description: Use on a tamed creature to bind it to your spirit allowing you to summon and dismiss it anywhere anytime. Bound pets or mounts will also respawn after death.
The eerie soul of an Aberration resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_angel.descr: The sacred soul of an Angel resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_aquatic.des: The elegant soul of an Aquatic creature resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_amphibian.d: The strange soul of an Amphibian resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_arachnid.de: The twisted soul of an Arachnid resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_insect.desc: The creepy soul of an Insect resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_avian.descr: The swift soul of an Avian creature resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_beast.descr: The vicious soul of a Beast resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_reptile.des: The majestic soul of a Reptile resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
The mighty soul of a Anthronian resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_demon.descr: The wicked soul of a Demon resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_dragon.desc: The proud soul of a Dragon resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_elemental.d: The magical essence of an Elemental resides within this Essencestone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_imp.descrip: The mischievous soul of an Imp resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_plant.descr: The flourishing soul of a Plant creature resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_undead.desc: The tireless soul of an Undead creature resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_worm.descri: The relentless soul of a Worm resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_golem.descr: The mechanical soul of a Golem resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_slime.descr: The remnant soul of a Slime resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.summoningstaff.descri: Summon minions to do your bidding! Start using to create a portal, over time the portal will drain your Summoning Focus (above your hunger bar).
Summoned minions last longer but costs more focus.
item.lycanitesmobs.bloodsummoningstaff.d: Half the focus cost by sacrificing your health in its place.
Summon double minions, but at half health each.
This staff lasts much longer but costs more focus.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_aberration.desc: A dark effigy made as tribute to a mysterious creature, but can you win it over?
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_angel.descripti: There are currently no Angel creatures added yet.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_aquatic.descrip: Made from tender fish, you can tame some aquatic creatures with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_amphibian.descr: Made from smelly slimes, you can tame some amphibians creatures with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_arachnid.descri: Made from fresh fruits, all sorts of arachnids will want to gorge on this.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_insect.descript: Made from fresh fruits, all sorts of insects will want to gorge on this.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_avian.descripti: Made from light meats, you can tame some avian creatures with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_beast.descripti: Made from juicy meats, you can tame some beasts with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_reptile.descrip: Made from juicy meats, you can tame some reptiles with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_anthronian.desc: Made from fatty meats, Brutes are quite simple minded, could any be swayed by this?
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_demon.descripti: All demons seem to enjoy snacking on Nether Wart between their meals of live flesh.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_dragon.descript: A treasure adorned with fine jewels, dragons love treasure.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_elemental.descr: Creative only, elementals can be summoned but not tamed.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_imp.description: Imps are unruly fiends but they can't resist the taste of rich meant.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_plant.descripti: Made from fresh vegetables and sugar cane, some plant creatures can be tamed with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_undead.descript: Made from the finest rotten flesh, but can any undead creature be swayed by this?
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_worm.descriptio: Made from very gamey meat, those worm creatures seem to like that.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_golem.descripti: Made from the finest machine parts, those golem creatures seem to like that.
item.lycanitesmobs.treat_slime.descripti: Made from very bouncy slime, those slime creatures seem to like that.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_aberration.des: A specially adapted saddle for the most obscure of creatures.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_angel.descript: There are currently no Angel creatures added yet.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_aquatic.descri: An aquadynamic saddle built for deep dives.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_amphibian.desc: This saddle is especially fitted for slippery creatures and exposure to various fluids.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_arachnid.descr: A saddle built to fit all manner of 8 or so legged creatures.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_insect.descrip: A lightweight saddle with modular fitting mechanisms.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_avian.descript: An aerodynamic saddle built especially for flight and glide adapted creatures, also feather friendly.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_beast.descript: A sturdy saddle with tight yet comfortable strapping.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_reptile.descri: A saddle with specialised thermal padding and cushioned fittings.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_anthronian.des: A saddle that looks more like a backpack or papoose, ideal for more bipedal mounts!
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_demon.descript: A saddle with wicked enchantments, tempered for the most demonic of beings.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_dragon.descrip: A jeweled saddle with special enchantments woven within each precious gem, worthy of a mighty dragon!
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_elemental.desc: Creative only, no elementals can be mounted currently.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_imp.descriptio: A strange backpack shaped saddle with several small straps.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_plant.descript: A specialised saddle made from materials that are plant friendly.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_undead.descrip: A saddle with enchantments designed to suppress and control spirits.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_worm.descripti: A long saddle with wide fittings, suitable for the longest and squirmiest of mounts!
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_golem.descript: Made from the finest machine parts, those golem creatures seem to like that.
item.lycanitesmobs.saddle_slime.descript: A saddle with special pads that can be filled and drained of chemicals which act as temporary adhesives to slime creatures.
boss.block.protection.place: The presence of a powerful being prevents you from placing this block.
boss.block.protection.break: The presence of a powerful being prevents you from destroying that block.
boss.damage.protection.range: That being is too powerful to be damaged from this range.
